title: Drugs and Vaccines
author: Raman-Wilms; Lalitha Canadian Pharmacists Association
description: For questions about drugs and vaccines, use these resources, talk to your local pharmacist or, if you require overnight assistance, call 8-1-1 and ask to speak with a pharmacist (available from 5pm to 9am every night of the week).
cleaned_text: For questions about drugs and vaccines, use these resources, talk to your local pharmacist or, if you require overnight assistance, call 8-1-1 and ask to speak with a pharmacist (available from 5pm to 9am every night of the week). Drug Directories Drug Directories Vaccines and Immunization Vaccines and Immunization Safety Advisories Safety Advisories Pharmaceutical Regulations Pharmaceutical Regulations Frequently Asked Questions Frequently Asked Questions I need the CPS. - You can access [Compendium of Pharmaceuticals and Specialties (CPS)](https://vpl.bibliocommons.com/item/show/207505038_compendium_of_pharmaceuticals_and_specialties)in print at the Central Library. The following drug information can be found in the [CPS ](https://vpl.bibliocommons.com/item/show/207505038_compendium_of_pharmaceuticals_and_specialties)or [Medline Plus.](https://medlineplus.gov/) - General Information - Side Effects - Drug interactions - also try using the [Drug Interactions Checker](https://www.drugs.com/drug_interactions.php) - Interactions between food, herbs, supplements and drugs - also try [Reference Shelf's](https://www.vpl.ca/digital-library/reference-shelf)Complimentary and Alternative Medicine How do I find out the generic name for the drug I am taking? - Try searching the [Merck Manuals Consumer Version.](https://www.merckmanuals.com/home/appendixes/drug-names-generic-and-brand?startswith=a#drugDrugTitleTrade%20) At what age(s) do I need to vaccinate my child? What are these vaccinations for? - Go to HealthLinkBC's [BC Immunization Schedules](https://www.healthlinkbc.ca/tools-videos/bc-immunization-schedules)page.
